title: Hunter X Hunter 2011
alternative_title: HUNTER×HUNTER ハンターハンター
description: Alternate retelling of the original Hunter x Hunter series. Gon Freece is a boy living on a small island. He learns that his fater who he doesn’t remember is an extremely famous man and an amazing hunter. Gon takes the hunte rexam to seek out his fater, but he soon learns that the challenges he must face will be beyond his imaginations.
